about.title: about.
about.subtitle: I'm a Frontend Developer & UI/UX Designer based in Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia.
about.paragraph1: I specialize in creating scalable and high-performance digital solutions for various platforms, including e-commerce websites, landing pages, and online stores. With a strong emphasis on user-centric design, I combine the best of frontend technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS to deliver visually engaging, seamless experiences.
about.paragraph2: I am dedicated to delivering seamless user experiences, constantly refining my skills by staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in both frontend development and UX/UI design.

frontend.description: As a Frontend Developer, I focus on crafting clean, maintainable, and efficient code to build responsive web applications. I work with the latest frontend technologies to ensure optimal performance, accessibility, and a seamless user experience across all devices.
